ConveyorBelt
============

.. currentmodule:: transport.continuous.solid

.. autoclass:: ConveyorBelt
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:

Overview
--------

The ``ConveyorBelt`` class provides mechanical conveying analysis for continuous solid transport using belt conveyors. This model incorporates belt tension calculations, power requirements, and material handling characteristics for horizontal and inclined conveyor systems.

See Also
--------

* :doc:`PneumaticConveying` - Pneumatic solid transport
* :doc:`GravityChute` - Gravity-driven transport
* :doc:`ScrewFeeder` - Controlled solid feeding
